awards.text: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 13 wins & 20 nominations.

fullplot: Set on a colorful Greek island, the plot serves as a background for a wealth of ABBA songs. A young woman about to be married discovers that any one of three men could be her father. She invites all three to the wedding without telling her mother, Donna, who was once the lead singer of Donna and the Dynamos. In the meantime, Donna has invited her backup singers, Rosie and Tanya.
plot: The story of a bride-to-be trying to find her real father told using hit songs by the popular '70s group ABBA.
title: Mamma Mia!

tomatoes.consensus: This jukebox musical is full of fluffy fun but rough singing voices and a campy tone might not make you feel like "You Can Dance" the whole 90 minutes.
